subject: This weeks' component news: $34,000+ in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

This week we've got $34,050 in new design and development competitions, and a new JSP development project (listed under Assembly Competitions) with $4,500 in prizes.

=================================================================
1. THIS WEEK'S COMPONENT PROJECTS: 

Design: $23,700 in total prizes
* Java RPT Logging Adapter Version 1.0  ($800.00)
* Java Remote Execution Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java File Verification Tools Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Linux FS State Retriever Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java MS OOXML Document Interface Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET XML Tree Viewer Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET MSMQ Service Version 2.0 ($800.00)
* .NET ASP.NET Jscript Collapsible Panel Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET MSMQ Monitor Version 2.0 ($800.00)
* Java Document Repository Version 1.0 ($1,000.00)
* .NET Columns Handler Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET Custom Grid Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Ban Management Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET AJAX Customizable Page Layout Version 1.0 ($1,200.00)
* .NET DataSet Synchronization Version 1.1 ($800.00)
* Custom .NET PMC Service Version 1.1 ($800.00)
* Custom .NET PMC Synchronization Service Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Document Searcher Version 1.1 ($800.00)
* Java Metadata Manager Version 1.1 ($800.00)
  Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=112

Development: $10,350 in total prizes
* Java Multipart Filter Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* .NET Mobile XML Signature SHA-256 Plug-in Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* .NET Query Analyzer Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* .NET Hierarchical Drop Down Server Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java Binary Stream Parser Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java Survey Persistence Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Survey Servlet Version 1.0 ($600.00)
* Custom Java Time Tracker Application My Account Config Phase II Version Version 3.1 ($1,200.00)
* Custom Java Time Tracker Application Main Page Phase II Version Version 3.1 ($700.00)
* Java Survey Manager Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java Survey Content Version 1.0($600.00)
  Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=113


=================================================================
2. NEW JSP DEVELOPMENT COMPETITION:

We are currently running a competition to develop JSPs for 8 pages in a survey application -- the Morpheus Survey JSP Development project.

It requires the following deliverables:
- A JSP for each page in the survey. JSTL should be used to improve JSP readability and functionality.
- Any JSP templates that the base JSP files reference.
- A test servlet including mockup entity objects to test and display the submitted JSPs and verify that they function as required. This mockup will be necessary as the Survey Servlet component is not yet developed.
- Some JavaScript will be required to implement some of the features depicted in the prototype. The details for this are specified below in Section 3.

Prizes:
- First-place: $3,000
- Second-place: $1,500

Learn more here: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ProjectDetail&pj=30001506
 
Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
